assessment_meta.title: What's Your Hidden Superpower?
assessment_meta.description: A fun, game-based personality quiz that reveals your unique strengths in just 5 minutes

instructions.intro: Discover your unique personality archetype through 12 quick scenarios. Your choices reveal patterns you might not even know about yourself!
instructions.response_format: Choose the option that feels most natural to you - no thinking required!
instructions.time_guidance: Go with your gut instinct. This should take about 5 minutes.
instructions.share_prompt: Share your result and challenge friends to discover their archetype!

questions.text: It's Friday night. What sounds most appealing?

options.text: Cozy night in with a book or movie

questions.text: Your workspace says a lot about you. Yours is:

options.text: Organized chaos - I know where everything is!
Full of creative inspiration and random items

questions.text: When faced with a big decision, you:

options.text: Make a pros/cons list and analyze everything
Sleep on it and trust your gut feeling
Ask trusted friends for their opinions
Jump in and figure it out as you go
Relaxing at a familiar favorite spot

questions.text: In group projects, you naturally become the:

options.text: Reliable executor who gets things done

questions.text: When someone criticizes you unfairly, you:

options.text: Feel hurt but don't show it
Brush it off - their problem, not yours

questions.text: You're at a party where you don't know anyone except the host. You:

options.text: Stick close to the host all night
Find one interesting person and deep-dive
Work the room and meet everyone
Leave early - this isn't your scene

questions.text: Your phone's photo gallery is mostly:
If you could have one superpower, it would be:

options.text: Mind reading - know what people think
Time travel - explore past and future

questions.text: When plans get cancelled last minute, you feel:

options.text: Frustrated - you were counting on it
Excited - now you can do something else!

questions.text: In a debate, you're more likely to:

options.text: Avoid it - conflict makes you uncomfortable
Listen to all sides and find common ground
Exactly the same every day - it's comforting
Flexible - depends on how you feel

archetypes.name: The Visionary Leader
archetypes.tagline: You see possibilities others miss and inspire people to follow
archetypes.profile: High Extraversion + High Openness + High Conscientiousness
archetypes.growth_tip: Balance your vision with listening to others' concerns

archetypes.name: The Harmonizer
archetypes.tagline: You create peace and connection wherever you go
archetypes.profile: High Agreeableness + High Emotional Stability + Moderate Extraversion
archetypes.growth_tip: Don't lose yourself trying to please everyone

archetypes.name: The Strategic Architect
archetypes.tagline: You build systems and structures that last
archetypes.profile: High Conscientiousness + High Openness + Low-Moderate Extraversion
archetypes.growth_tip: Sometimes good enough is better than perfect

archetypes.name: The Creative Free Spirit
archetypes.tagline: You see the world through a kaleidoscope of possibilities
archetypes.profile: High Openness + Low Conscientiousness + Variable Extraversion
archetypes.growth_tip: Channel your creativity with some structure to see projects through

archetypes.name: The Reliable Guardian
archetypes.tagline: People count on you because you always come through
archetypes.profile: High Conscientiousness + High Agreeableness + High Emotional Stability
archetypes.growth_tip: It's okay to take risks and break the rules sometimes

archetypes.name: The Social Butterfly
archetypes.tagline: Your energy lights up every room you enter
archetypes.profile: High Extraversion + High Agreeableness + Moderate-High Openness
archetypes.growth_tip: Make time for quiet reflection to recharge your core

archetypes.name: The Analytical Sage
archetypes.tagline: You understand the world through logic and careful observation
archetypes.profile: High Conscientiousness + High Openness + Low Extraversion + High Emotional Stability
archetypes.growth_tip: Don't forget that emotions and intuition have value too

archetypes.name: The Empathetic Healer
archetypes.tagline: You feel deeply and help others through their pain
archetypes.profile: High Agreeableness + Low Emotional Stability + Moderate Openness
archetypes.growth_tip: Remember to heal yourself while healing others

archetypes.name: The Adventurous Explorer
archetypes.tagline: Life is an adventure and you're here for all of it
archetypes.profile: High Openness + High Extraversion + Low Conscientiousness + High Emotional Stability
archetypes.growth_tip: Some planning can make adventures even better

archetypes.name: The Quiet Observer
archetypes.tagline: You see what others miss because you take time to watch
archetypes.profile: Low Extraversion + High Openness + High Emotional Stability
archetypes.growth_tip: Your voice matters - share your insights more often

archetypes.name: The Charismatic Performer
archetypes.tagline: The world is your stage and you were born to shine
archetypes.profile: High Extraversion + High Openness + Low Emotional Stability
archetypes.growth_tip: Build resilience to criticism - not everyone will love every performance

archetypes.name: The Pragmatic Realist
archetypes.tagline: You keep everyone grounded with your practical wisdom
archetypes.profile: High Conscientiousness + Low Openness + High Emotional Stability
archetypes.growth_tip: Stay open to new ideas that might seem impractical at first

archetypes.name: The Passionate Advocate
archetypes.tagline: You fight for what you believe in with fierce dedication
archetypes.profile: Low Agreeableness + High Conscientiousness + High Openness
archetypes.growth_tip: Pick your battles - you can't fight every fight

archetypes.name: The Spontaneous Improviser
archetypes.tagline: You thrive in chaos and make magic from the unexpected
archetypes.profile: Low Conscientiousness + High Extraversion + High Openness
archetypes.growth_tip: A little planning goes a long way for long-term goals

archetypes.name: The Independent Maverick
archetypes.tagline: You forge your own path and refuse to follow the crowd
archetypes.profile: Low Agreeableness + High Openness + Low Extraversion
archetypes.growth_tip: Collaboration can amplify your unique vision

archetypes.name: The Balanced Integrator
archetypes.tagline: Your superpower is seeing all sides and finding the middle way
archetypes.growth_tip: It's okay to take strong stands - you don't always need to be neutral

sections.heading: Your Archetype
sections.content: Display dominant archetype with emoji and tagline

sections.heading: Want Deeper Insights?
sections.content: CTA for full OCEAN assessment + email capture

social_share.template: I'm a {archetype_name}! {emoji} What's your personality archetype? Take the quiz: {url}
